BG Group's Helge Lund takes the stand to deliver the #gastech2015 keynote address https://t.co/KxFc8XJwLh
"I firmly believe gas has an exciting future" - Helge Lund, BG Group Chief Executive #gastech
"Our view is that #LNG will ultimately drive the globalisation of the natural gas industry" BG's Helge Lund during #gastech keynote
Helge Lund: "the weak #oil price environment we face actually makes it easier to drive the scale of the change required"
RT @SusanSakmar: Helge Lund CEO @BGGroup says #LNG will drive globalisation of #naturalgas industry. https://t.co/3ZeQpoFcXC
Helge Lund: "the fall in #oil prices is only a marker for a larger trend: our industry’s undisciplined decision-making over the past decade"
Helge: "in 2014 IOC’s were spending more than twice as much as they had in 2004, to produce the same volumes of #oil and #gas" #gastech
"...as the oil price sat mostly above 100 dollars for 10 years, the returns the industry delivered collapsed"
"We must be honest with ourselves. We must confront the brutal facts. We have to deliver a more competitive return" - Helge Lund
"there are three key elements to build a sustainable business: discipline, innovation and people" - BG Group Chief Exec, Helge Lund

Helge Lund: "We need to attract more young people who will challenge our thinking and bring new skills" #gastech #oilandgas #newgeneration
Helge: "Having the right people in our teams means bringing a broad spectrum of views into the decision making process" #diversity #gastech
BG Group Chief Exec Helge Lund, during #gastech keynote address: "@COP21 is a critical moment in shaping the response to #climatechange"
Helge:"We need to address the new energy reality. The world needs to reduce #emissions at the same time as increasing the supply of #energy"
BG's Helge Lund: "this an industry which is used to making the impossible routine" #gastech #oilandgas #innovation
BG's Helge Lund: "We have the capacity, #technology and financial resources to build a more sustainable industry" #gastech
